column5: First,  Welcome to San Antonio. I would love to host you and your family in my Cozy space. Very gorgeous grounds, restaurants, bars, shopping, amusement parks, gym and juicing shop onsite-Uber pick up and drop off offered. Initial grocery shopping service available with lists and prepayment.  -room 1 has queen size bed.  -room 2 has trundle bed that converts to a king bed -livingroom has oversized sofa and a futon  Both rooms are large enough for air matress and floor mattresses
